review: Decent game. I would suggest even for those who aren't that keen to grab the game when it comes on sale ($3.75) as you can make your money back, just from selling items you get in game for free. This game is what is fuelling my game purchases from now on. Besides from that, it's a great FPS, but is more then just a FPS. It uses strategy, teamwork, and commitment, all of which have resulted in a (mostly) good community. It's also has custom features, so you can choose your weapon skins, and can buy 'DLC' packs that support community modders.  And to finish it off, it's got continued dev support, so it will (hopefully) only get better.

Brings an economic side to all those strategy games, although it does have combat. Overall it is a good game. Unlike other economic strategy games which are broad ('Build a Farm' - what sort of farm? Pig farm? Cow Farm? Ladybug farm?) it is much like stronghold, in the way that it is more specific for each category (E.G you can choose a weapon factory, furniture etc.) although that does come at a cost (just like in stronghold) as it limits the amount of categories there are. However this does not impact on the game. Suggestions? The AI is extremely easy, and you can almost never loose an election. Buy this when on sale. Plenty of fun.
